findings.name: divide-before-multiply
findings.message:
LockingMultiRewards.epoch() (src/staking/LockingMultiRewards.sol#257-259) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- (block.timestamp / rewardsDuration) * rewardsDuration (src/staking/LockingMultiRewards.sol#258)

findings.name: cache-array-length
findings.message: Loop condition i < rewardTokens.length (src/staking/LockingMultiRewards.sol#547) should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.

findings.name: cache-array-length
findings.message: Loop condition i < rewardTokens.length (src/staking/LockingMultiRewards.sol#561) should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.
